detectors.description: Pitch.push(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#138-140) ignores return value by transferFrom(msg.sender,usr,wad) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#139)
Pitch.pull(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#141-143) ignores return value by transferFrom(usr,msg.sender,wad) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#142)
Pitch.move(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#144-146) ignores return value by transferFrom(src,dst,wad) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#145)

Pitch.rely(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#54) can write the state variable array at will

	- wards[guy] = 1 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#54)

detectors.description:
Pitch.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#149-171) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- require(bool,string)(nonce == nonces[holder] ++,Pitch/invalid-nonce) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#167)
	- wad = uint256(- 1) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#168)

detectors.description:
Pitch.permit(address,address,uint256,uint256,bool,uint8,bytes32,bytes32) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#149-171) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool,string)(expiry == 0 || now <= expiry,Pitch/permit-expired) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Pitch__1.sol#166)
